adminTemplateConfigureSettings.title: Configure Template Settings
adminTemplateConfigureSettings.templateS: All changes to the requisition template columns and settings will only affect future initiated requisitions.
Save changes to the requisition template
adminTemplateConfigureSettings.rejection: This determines whether or not a window to select a rejection reason will display
adminTemplateConfigureSettings.requisiti: Determines whether the requisition template can be configured as report only or not
